subject: Re: [junit] Can't run anything from textui?
msgSnippet: ... Where s JUnit on the classpath here? The -cp switch doesn t magically include your CLASSPATH environment variable. Maybe you want -cp $CLASSPATH:. When I
messageBody:
Ryan Platte wrote:

> ~/src/junit-try $ java -cp . junit.textui.TestRunner
> com.example.namespace.TestTest
> Class not found "com.example.namespace.TestTest"

Where's JUnit on the classpath here? The -cp switch doesn't magically
include your CLASSPATH environment variable. Maybe you want

-cp $CLASSPATH:.

When I ran it on my system with both JUnit and . in the classpath, it
worked fine.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
